scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd .. && cd server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.deploy2:server: cd server && rm -rf .serverless && serverless deploy --stage dev
scripts.db:local: cd server && serverless dynamodb start --migrate --stage local && cd ..
scripts.start:local: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run db:local" "npm run client" "npm run deploy1:server"
